about_the_game:
IMPORTANT: THIS IS AN EARLY ALPHA PHASE OF THE GAME!

While prone to bugs and errors, and still pending content, the core aspect of the game is playable.
Recommended to be played with two players in current state!

Starkheim Tournament is a 2D fighting game, set in fantasy universe with a pixel-art style. Utilizing simpler control scheme than traditional fighting games, the game allows everyone to perform big combo chains, with uniqueness of each character each playstyle is different, and hidden mechanics ensure gameplay complexity that will keep you on your guard during a fight.

The future is a blank slate

Prophecy speaks of a return of a calamity, a harbinger of discord long ago stopped by a powerful warrior who left no legacy or any trace of his life. With no clue on how to prevent the disaster, Starkheim and its people desperately seek to appoint a champion capable of restraining its source. Perhaps among the recent events that took place around the lands, conflicts that broke out and newly formed alliances, a worthy candidate will be unearthed.

It doesn't take much to be a warrior

With only two primary attack buttons, and controls that do not require any complicated motions, Starkheim Tournament aims to be easy to pick up and only just moderate to master. Each character, despite differences is playstyle, follow the same principles, making it easier to pick between different fighters.

Be yourself on the arena

Pick from cast of 12 characters, from a nimble pirate queen, brave paladin, unshaken viking hero, to a madness driven black knight, nightmarish alien entity, and even a weapon summoning angel of war. Each character comes with a distinctive fighting style, strengths, weaknesses, and unique quirks, and each provides an unique playstyle.
